title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contributing to embr
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to embr
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed).

title: Contributing to embr
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("", fork = TRUE). Install development dependences devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. Begin commit merge messages - indicate user facing changes included NEWS.md. use fledge automatically generate NEWS.md file.

title: Contributing to embr
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to embr
text: Please note embr project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

title: Getting help with embr
text: Thanks using embr! filing issue, places explore pieces put together make process smooth possible.

title: Getting help with embr
text: opening new issue, sure search issues pull requests make sure bug hasn’t reported /already fixed development version. default, search pre-populated :issue :open. can edit qualifiers (e.g. :pr, :closed) needed. example, ’d simply remove :open search issues repo, open closed.

title: Getting help with embr
text: Start making minimal reproducible example using reprex package. haven’t heard used reprex , ’re treat! Seriously, reprex make R-question-asking endeavors easier (pretty insane ROI five ten minutes ’ll take learn ’s ). additional reprex pointers, check Get help! section tidyverse site.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Thorley J, Müller K (2025). embr: Model Builder Utility Functions Virtual Classes. R package version 0.0.1.9037, https://github.com/poissonconsulting/embr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {embr: Model Builder Utility Functions and Virtual Classes},   author = {Joe Thorley and Kirill Müller},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1.9037},   url = {https://github.com/poissonconsulting/embr}, }

title: Model Builder Utility Functions and Virtual Classes
text: embr (pronounced EMBR) R package utility functions virtual classes model builder family R packages. Currently packages implement functionality JAGS (jmbr), STAN (smbr) TMB (tmbr).

title: Model Builder Utility Functions and Virtual Classes
Model Builder Utility Functions and Virtual Classes
text: Please report issues. Pull requests always welcome.

title: Model Builder Utility Functions and Virtual Classes
text: Please note embr project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

text: conditional R2 value proportion variance response predicted full model. marginal R2 values just fixed effects ie marginalizing random effects.

text: x object. param_type string indicating type terms get names . ... arguments passed methods.

title: Get Analysis Mode — get_analysis_mode
text: Retrieves set following package options. mb.nchains count number chains. mb.niters count number simulations save per chain. mb.nthin count thining interval. mb.parallel flag indicating whether perform analysis parallel. mb.quiet flag indicating whether disable tracing information. mb.beep flag indicating whether beep completion analysis. mb.glance flag indicating whether print model summary. mb.nreanalyses count specifying maximum number reanalyses. mb.rhat number specifying rhat threshold. mb.esr number specifying minimum effective sampling rate. mb.duration maximum total time spend analysis reanalysis. mb.conf_level number specifying confidence level.

title: Is syntactic — is.syntactic
text: logical vector indicating whether syntactically correct variable name.

title: Is syntactic — is.syntactic
code: is.syntactic(c("0", "x", "1x", "x y", "x1")) #> [1] FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE

title: Is Named List — is_namedlist
code: is_namedlist(1) #> [1] FALSE is_namedlist(list()) #> [1] TRUE is_namedlist(list(1)) #> [1] FALSE is_namedlist(list(x = 1)) #> [1] TRUE is_namedlist(list(x = list(y = 2))) #> [1] FALSE

title: MB Code — mb_code
text: Identifies type code creates object appropriate class.

title: MB Code — mb_code
text: template string, braced `` expression (unquoted quoted), object class `"mb_code"`. x string braced `` expression. class class new object.

title: MB Code — mb_code
code: x <- mb_code(   "#include <TMB.hpp>  template<class Type>  Type objective_function<Type>::operator() () { DATA_VECTOR(Count); PARAMETER(bIntercept);  int n = Count.size();  Type nll = 0.0; for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){   nll -= dpois(Count(i), bIntercept, true); } return nll; } " ) class(x) #> [1] "tmb_code" "mb_code"

title: MB Model — model
code: model(   x = NULL,   ...,   code = NULL,   gen_inits = NULL,   random_effects = list(),   fixed = getOption("mb.fixed", "^[^e]"),   derived = character(0),   select_data = list(),   center = character(0),   scale = character(0),   modify_data = identity,   nthin = getOption("mb.nthin", 1L),   new_expr = NULL,   new_expr_vec = getOption("mb.new_expr_vec", FALSE),   modify_new_data = identity,   drops = list() )

title: MB Model — model
text: x string, object inheriting class `"mb_code"`. ... Unused arguments. code Passed [mb_code()]. `x` `NULL`, `code` must `NULL`, vice versa. gen_inits single argument function taking modified data returning named list initial values. random_effects named list specifying random effects associated factors. fixed string regular expression specifying fixed pars monitor. derived character vector derived pars monitor. select_data named list specifying columns select associated classes values well transformations scaling options. center character vector columns center. scale character vector columns scale (centering). modify_data single argument function modify data (list form) immediately prior analysis. nthin count specifying thinning interval. new_expr string R code specifying predictive relationships. new_expr_vec flag specifying whether vectorize new_expr code. modify_new_data single argument function modify new data (list form) immediately prior calculating new_expr. drops list character vector possible scalar pars drop (fix 0).

title: MB Model — model
text: tmb models gen_inits must specify fixed pars. Missing random pars assigned value 0. jmb models unspecified initial values chain drawn prior distributions.

title: Modify Data — modify_data

text: object object inheriting class mb_analysis. new_data data frame calculate predictions . new_expr string R code specifying predictive relationship. new_values named list new replacement values pass new_expr. term string term new_expr. conf_level number specifying confidence level. default 0.95. modify_new_data single argument function modify new data (list form) immediately prior calculating new_expr. ref_data flag data frame 1 row indicating reference values calculating effects size. ref_fun2 function whose first argument takes vector two numbers returns scalar metric difference . new_expr_vec flag specifying whether vectorize new_expr code. parallel flag indicating whether predictions using parallel backend provided foreach. quiet flag indicating whether disable tracing information. beep flag indicating whether beep completion analysis. ... Additional arguments.

Possible values "laplace" (double exponential), "logistic", "lognormal", "normal", "t" "nt" (non-central Student t). ... used. parallel flag indicating whether perform analysis parallel possible. quiet flag indicating whether disable tracing information. glance flag indicating whether print model summary. beep flag indicating whether beep completion analysis.

title: Set Analysis Mode — set_analysis_mode
text: possible modes follows: 'debug' rapidly identify problems model definition. 'quick' quickly test code runs. 'report' produce results report. 'paper' produce results peer-reviewed paper. 'check' run checking package. 'reset' reset options NULL default values function call. case mode unique combination following package options mb.nchains count number chains. mb.niters count number simulations save per chain. mb.nthin count thining interval. mb.parallel flag indicating whether perform analysis parallel. mb.quiet flag indicating whether disable tracing information. mb.beep flag indicating whether beep completion analysis. mb.glance flag indicating whether print model summary. mb.nreanalyses count specifying maximum number reanalyses. mb.rhat number specifying rhat threshold. mb.esr number specifying minimum effective sampling rate. mb.duration maximum total time spend analysis reanalysis. mb.conf_level number specifying confidence level.

text: model model update. code string model template object inheriting class mb_code. gen_inits single argument function taking modified data returning named list initial values. random_effects named list specifying random effects associated factors. fixed string regular expression specifying fixed pars monitor. derived character vector derived pars monitor. select_data named list specifying columns select associated classes values well transformations scaling options. center character vector columns center. scale character vector columns scale (centering). modify_data single argument function modify data (list form) immediately prior analysis. nthin count specifying thinning interval. new_expr string R code specifying predictive relationships. new_expr_vec flag specifying whether vectorize new_expr code. modify_new_data single argument function modify new data (list form) immediately prior calculating new_expr. drops list character vector possible scalar pars drop (fix 0). ... Unused arguments.

title: embr 0.0.1.9037
text: Add get_analysis_mode() function get current package options

title: embr 0.0.1.9036
text: Implement "pmb_code" class support strict subset nimble language (#64). check_model_pars() returns derived (#62).

title: embr 0.0.1.9036
text: engine = "jags". Use raw GitHub file. Get JAGS.exe S3 bucket. Relax test.

title: embr 0.0.1.9035
text: Remove param_type scalar arguments pars.character() pars.mb_code() scalar pars.model() add "raw" parameter type pars.mb_model() pars.mb_analysis().

title: embr 0.0.1.9034
text: Set default value new_expr_vec getOption("mb.new_expr_vec", FALSE) Add new_expr_vec = FALSE predict().

title: embr 0.0.1.9033
text: Automatically wrap new expression one. Set new_expr_vec flag FALSE default. Add new_expr = FALSE argument mcmc_derive.mb_analyses.

title: embr 0.0.1.9032
text: mcmc_derive() mcmc_derive_data() longer vectorize new expression default Rename mbr embr. posterior_predictive_check() now gives zeros default. soft deprecated plot_data(). make pars.character() internal .

title: embr 0.0.1.9031
text: Added ref_fun2 argument. Added random_effects argument predict etc control random effects. Merge pull request #30 poissonconsulting/changes_to_actions. Updating R CMD check Actions Merge pull request #29 poissonconsulting/chkor. replace chkor Added zeros = FALSE argument posterior_predictive_check() type = NULL residuals simulate residuals. Remove zeros posterior predictive checks. longer export mcmc packages. Merge branch ‘master’ github.com:poissonconsulting/embr. Renamed resample_residuals() simulate_residuals(). Added resample residuals alters residual code!

title: embr 0.0.1.9029
text: fix simplify = TRUE add deltaIC glance() add split bound rhat converged add deltaIC glance() add marginalize_random_effects argument data_set numericize difftime values cause problems STAN set_analysis_mode() now ensures options set unless mode = "reset" rhat decreased 1.1 1.05 report mode 1.05 1.01 paper mode. parameters() now returns character(0) opposed NULL parameters. Rename derive() derive_data() mcmc_derive() mcmc_derive_data(). Moved pow() mcmcderive package.

title: embr 0.0.1
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
